title: Deciphering intersystem crossing and energy transfer mechanisms in a nonacoordinated ternary europium(III) complex: a combined spectroscopic and theoretical study
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,32573-32582
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA06727D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Houda Al-Sharji, Rashid Ilmi, Willyan F. Oliveira, Balqees S. Al-Saadi, José D. L. Dutra, Osama K. Abou-Zied, Paul R. Raithby, Muhammad S. Khan
Utilizing pump-probe ultrafast transient absorption spectroscopy in tandem with TD-DFT and LUMPAC, we shed light on the intricate photophysical events occurring in the vicinity of the ligands in a [Eu(hfaa)3(Ph-TerPyr)] complex.
